description: This file appears to be a comprehensive C++ source file implementing core logic for the RDK Shell plugin, which manages application lifecycle, system events, and inter-component communication within the RDK platform. It includes class and method definitions for handling application states, JSON-RPC communication, and event notifications, along with global state management and threading mechanisms.

methods.name: launchRequestThread
methods.description: Creates a thread to process RDK Shell API requests such as launching and controlling applications, subscribing to system events, and other commands.

methods.name: handleInitialize
methods.description: Handles initialization of a plugin instance, including setting up display requests and event listeners based on the service state.

methods.name: handleActivated
methods.description: Handles application activation events, managing display requests, event subscriptions, and service-specific logic.

methods.name: handleDeactivated
methods.description: Handles deactivation of applications, managing cleanup and state updates.

methods.name: handleDeinitialized
methods.description: Handles deinitialization of a service, performing cleanup such as removing display requests and event listeners.

methods.name: updateSurfaceClientIdentifiers
methods.description: Updates surface client identifiers in the plugin configuration for proper surface management.

methods.name: ignoreResidentAppLaunch
methods.description: Determines whether to ignore launching the Resident application based on factory mode and activation state.

methods.name: CreateDisplayRequest(std::string client,std::string displayName,uint32_t displayWidth=0,uint32_t displayHeight=0,bool virtualDisplayEnabled=false,uint32_t virtualWidth=0,uint32_t virtualHeight=0,bool topmost=false,bool focus=false)
bool FromMessage(Core::JSON::IElement * response,const Core::ProxyType<Core::JSONRPC::Message> & message,bool isResponseString=false) const
bool FromMessage(RESPONSE & response,const Core::ProxyType<Core::JSONRPC::Message> & message,bool isResponseString=false) const
uint32_t Get(const uint32_t waitTime,const string & method,PARAMETERS & respObject)
uint32_t Invoke(const uint32_t waitTime,const string & method,const PARAMETERS & parameters,RESPONSE & response,bool isResponseString=false)
